ing: 1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
des: "A cheesy, spicy spinach good for both dipping and as a side.  My family and friends beg for it!"
ins:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
In a 2 quart casserole dish combine cheese, spinach and milk.
Bake in preheated oven for 15 to 20 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Let stand 5 minutes before serving.
